DOC.brief_summary: To assess acceptability user-filled , paper , applicator delivery tenofovir ( TFV ) gel among woman high risk acquire human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) rural KwaZulu-Natal , South Africa .

All study participant CAPRISA 008 also participate CAPRISA 004 thus several year experience use TFV gel prefilled , plastic applicator .
